content.rendered:
Belly and her family head to the Fisher family’s beach house in Cousins every summer. Every summer is the same … Belly until he was sixteen. This summer puts relationships to the test, painful truths are revealed and Belly changes forever. It’s the first summer of love, the first heartache, and the summer of growing up — the summer when Belly gets beautified.”

Seasons: 1 (2022- )

Status: Ongoing

Creator: Gabrielle G. Stanton, Jenny Han

Channel: Amazon

Starring: Lola Tung, Jackie Chung, Rachel Blanchard
